casebody.data:
H.G.K.W. CORPORATION, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. TOWNSHIP OF EAST BRUNSWICK, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued March 17, 1987 Decided March 31, 1987.

Before Judges GAULKIN, BAIME and ASHBEY.

Harold A. Kuskin argued the cause for appellant {Lasser, Hochman, Marcus, Guryan & Kuskin, attorneys). William T. Yadlon argued the cause for respondent (Busch & Busch, attorneys). PER CURIAM.

The July 1, 1986 judgment is affirmed substantially for the reasons expressed in Judge Andrew’s July 16, 1986 opinion reported at 8 N.J.Tax 454 (Tax Ct.1986).
